name: Notion Budget Template - The 50/30/20 method
description: This easy to use budgeting planner is based on the 50/30/20 budgeting method. The 50/30/20 is a money management technique that divides your income(s) into three categories: 50% for the essentials20% for savings30% for anything you want to spend onThe planner includes:a brief introduction to the 50/30/20 budgeting methoda detailed "Calculator" that allows you to evaluate the amount you can spend per category and in case you have multiple incomes, it sums up the full amount for youa detailed "Exp
features: 50% for the essentials; 20% for savings; 30% for anything you want to spend on; a brief introduction to the 50/30/20 budgeting method; a detailed "Calculator"that allows you to evaluate the amount you can spend per category and in case you have multiple incomes, it sums up the full amount for you; a detailed "Expense Tracker"to plan your expenses and different views to check expenses per category; a "Goalsthis month"section
